verses.verse: After <WG3326> These Things <WG5023> Manifested <WG5319> Himself <WG1438> Again <WG3825> <WG3588> Jesus <WG2424> To The <WG3588> Disciples <WG3101> At <WG1909> The <WG3588> Sea <WG2281> <WG3588> Of Tiberias. <WG5085> <WG5319> And He Manifested Himself <WG1161> Thus : <WG3779>

There Were <WG2258> Together <WG3674> Simon <WG4613> Peter, <WG4074> And <WG2532> Thomas <WG2381> <WG3588> Called <WG3004> Didymus, <WG1324> And <WG2532> Nathanael <WG3482> <WG3588> From <WG575> Cana <WG2580> <WG3588> Of Galilee, <WG1056> And <WG2532> The Sons <WG3588> <WG3588> Of Zebedee, <WG2199> And <WG2532> Others <WG243> Of <WG1537> <WG3588> Disciples <WG3101> His <WG846> Two. <WG1417>

Says <WG3004> To Them <WG846> Simon <WG4613> Peter, <WG4074> I Go <WG5217> To Fish. <WG232> They Say <WG3004> To Him, <WG846> Come <WG2064> Also <WG2532> We <WG2249> With <WG4862> Thee. <WG4671> They Went Forth <WG1831> And <WG2532> Went Up <WG305> Into <WG1519> The <WG3588> Ship <WG4143>, Immediately, <WG2117> And <WG2532> During <WG1722> That <WG1565> <WG3588> Night <WG3571> They Took <WG4084> Nothing. <WG3762>

<WG4405> And Morning <WG1161> Already <WG2235> Being Come <WG1096> Stood <WG2476> <WG3588> Jesus <WG2424> On <WG1519> The <WG3588> Shore; <WG123> Not <WG3756> However <WG3305> Knew <WG1492> The <WG3588> Disciples <WG3101> That <WG3754> Jesus <WG2424> It Is. <WG2076>

Says <WG3004> Therefore <WG3767> To Them <WG846> <WG3588> Jesus, <WG2424> <WG3813> Little Children, <WG3361> Any <WG5100> Food <WG4371> Have Ye? <WG2192> They Answered <WG611> Him, <WG846> No. <WG3756>

<WG3588> And He <WG1161> Said <WG2036> To Them, <WG846> Cast <WG906> To <WG1519> The <WG3588> Right <WG1188> Side <WG3313> Of The <WG3588> Ship <WG4143> The <WG3588> Net, <WG1350> And <WG2532> Ye Shall Find. <WG2147> They Cast <WG906> Therefore, <WG3767> And <WG2532> No <WG3756> Longer <WG2089> It <WG846> To Draw <WG1670> Were They Able <WG2480> From <WG575> The <WG3588> Multitude <WG4128> Of The <WG3588> Fishes. <WG2486>

Says <WG3004> Therefore <WG3767> <WG3588> <WG3101> That Disciple <WG1565> Whom <WG3739> Loved <WG25> <WG3588> Jesus <WG2424> <WG3588> To Peter, <WG4074> The <WG3588> Lord <WG2962> It Is. <WG2076> Simon <WG4613> Therefore <WG3767> Peter, <WG4074> Having Heard <WG191> That <WG3754> The <WG3588> Lord <WG2962> It Is, <WG2076> <WG3588> His Upper Garment <WG1903> He Girded On, <WG1241> <WG2258> For He Was <WG1063> Naked, <WG1131> And <WG2532> Cast <WG906> Himself <WG1438> Into <WG1519> The <WG3588> Sea. <WG2281>

<WG3588> And The <WG1161> Other <WG243> Disciples <WG3101> In The <WG3588> Small Ship <WG4142> Came, <WG2064> <WG3756> For Not <WG1063> Were They <WG2258> Far <WG3112> From <WG575> The <WG3588> Land, <WG1093> ' <WG235> But <WG5613> Somewhere About <WG575> Cubits <WG4083> Two Hundred, <WG1250> Dragging <WG4951> The <WG3588> Net <WG1350> <WG3588> Of Fishes. <WG2486>

When <WG5613> Therefore <WG3767> They Went Up <WG576> On <WG1519> The <WG3588> Land <WG1093> They See <WG991> A Fire Of Coals <WG439> Lying <WG2749> And <WG2532> Fish <WG3795> Lying On It, <WG1945> And <WG2532> Bread. <WG740>
Says <WG3004> To Them <WG846> <WG3588> Jesus, <WG2424> Bring <WG5342> Of <WG575> The <WG3588> Fishes <WG3795> Which <WG3739> Ye Took <WG4084> Just Now. <WG3568>

Went Up <WG305> Simon <WG4613> Peter, <WG4074> And <WG2532> Drew <WG1670> The <WG3588> Net <WG1350> To <WG1909> The <WG3588>, Land, <WG1093> Full <WG3324> Of Fishes <WG2486> Large <WG3173> A Hundred And <WG1540> Fifty Three; <WG4004> <WG5140> And Though <WG2532> So Many <WG5118> There Were <WG5607> <WG3756> Was Not Rent <WG4977> The <WG3588> Net. <WG1350>

Says <WG3004> To Them <WG846> <WG3588> Jesus, <WG2424> Come Ye, <WG1205> Dine. <WG709> <WG3762> But None <WG1161> Ventured <WG5111> Of The <WG3588> Disciples <WG3101> To Ask <WG1833> Him, <WG846> Thou <WG4771> Who <WG5101> Art? <WG1488> Knowing <WG1492> That <WG3754> The <WG3588> Lord <WG2962> It Is. <WG2076>

Comes <WG2064> Therefore <WG3767> <WG3588> Jesus <WG2424> And <WG2532> Takes <WG2983> The <WG3588> Bread <WG740> And <WG2532> Gives <WG1325> To Them, <WG846> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Fish <WG3795> In Like Manner. <WG3668>

This Is <WG5124> Now <WG2235> The Third Time <WG5154> Was Manifested <WG5319> <WG3588> Jesus <WG2424> <WG3588> <WG3101>, To His Disciples <WG846> Having Been Raised <WG1453> From Among The <WG1537> Dead. <WG3498>

When <WG3753> Therefore <WG3767> They Had Dined, <WG709> Says <WG3004> <WG3588> To Simon <WG4613> Peter <WG4074> <WG3588> Jesus, <WG2424> Simon Son <WG4613>, Of Jonah, <WG2495> Lovest Thou <WG25> Me <WG3165> More <WG4119> Than These? <WG5130> <WG5130> He Says <WG3004> To Him, <WG846> Yea, <WG3483> Lord; <WG2962> Thou <WG4771> Knowest <WG1492> That <WG3754> I Have Affection For <WG5368> Thee. <WG4571> He Says <WG3004> To Him, <WG846> Feed <WG1006> <WG3588> <WG721> My Lambs. <WG3450>

He Says <WG3004> To Him <WG846> Again <WG3825> A Second Time, <WG1208> Simon Son <WG4613> Of Jonah, <WG2495> Lovest Thou <WG25> Me? <WG3165> He Says <WG3004> To Him, <WG846> Yea, <WG3483> Lord; <WG2962> Thou <WG4771> Knowest <WG1492> That <WG3754> I Have Affection For <WG5368> Thee. <WG4571> He Says <WG3004> To Him, <WG846> Shepherd <WG4165> <WG3588> Sheep <WG4263> My. <WG3450>

He Says <WG3004> To Him <WG846> The <WG3588> Third Time, <WG5154> Simon Son <WG4613>, Of Jonah, <WG2495> Hast Thou Affection For <WG5368> Me? <WG3165> Was Grieved <WG3076> <WG3588> Peter <WG4074> Because <WG3754> He Said <WG2036> To Him <WG846> The <WG3588> Third Time, <WG5154> Hast Thou Affection For <WG5368> Me? <WG3165> And <WG2532> Said <WG2036> To Him, <WG846> Lord, <WG2962> Thou <WG4771> All Things <WG3956> Knowest; <WG1492> Thou <WG4771> Knowest <WG1097> That <WG3754> I Have Affection For <WG5368> Thee. <WG4571> Says <WG3004> To Him <WG846> <WG3588> Jesus, <WG2424> Feed <WG1006> <WG3588> <WG4263> My Sheep. <WG3450>

Verily <WG281> Verily <WG281> I Say <WG3004> To Thee, <WG4671> When <WG3753> Thou Wast <WG2258> Younger <WG3501> Thou Girdedst <WG2224> Thyself, <WG4572> And <WG2532> Walkedst <WG4043> Where <WG3699> Thou Didst Desire; <WG2309> <WG3752> But When <WG1161> Thou Shalt Be Old <WG1095> Thou Shalt Stretch Forth <WG1614> <WG3588> <WG5495> Thy Hands, <WG4675> And <WG2532> Another <WG243> Thee <WG4571> Shall Gird, <WG2224> And <WG2532> Bring Thee <WG5342> Where <WG3699> <WG3756> Thou Dost Not Desire. <WG2309>

<WG5124> But This <WG1161> He Said <WG2036> Signifying <WG4591> By What <WG4169> Death <WG2288> He Should Glorify <WG1392> <WG3588> God. <WG2316> And <WG2532> This <WG5124> Having Said <WG2036> He Says <WG3004> To Him, <WG846> Follow <WG190> Me. <WG3427>

<WG1994> But Having Turned <WG1161> <WG3588> Peter <WG4074> Sees <WG991> The <WG3588> Disciple <WG3101> Whom <WG3739> Loved <WG25> <WG3588> Jesus <WG2424> Following, <WG190> Who <WG3739> Also <WG2532> Reclined <WG377> At <WG1722> The <WG3588> Supper <WG1173> On <WG1909> <WG3588> <WG4738> His Breast <WG846> And <WG2532> Said, <WG2036> Lord, <WG2962> Who <WG5101> Is It <WG2076> Who <WG3588> Is Delivering Up <WG3860> Thee? <WG4571>
Him <WG5126> Seeing <WG1492> <WG3588> Peter <WG4074> Says <WG3004> <WG3588> To Jesus, <WG2424> Lord, <WG2962> <WG3778> But Of This One <WG1161> What; <WG5101>

Says <WG3004> To Him <WG846> <WG3588> Jesus, <WG2424> If <WG1437> Him <WG846> I Desire <WG2309> To Abide <WG3306> Till <WG2193> I Come, <WG2064> What Is It <WG5101> To <WG4314> Thee? <WG4571> Thou <WG4771> Follow <WG190> Me. <WG3427>

Went Out <WG1831> Therefore <WG3767> <WG3588> <WG3056> This Word <WG3778> Among <WG1519> The <WG3588> Brethren, <WG80> That <WG3754> <WG3588> <WG3101> That Disciple <WG1565> <WG3756> Does Not Die. <WG599> However <WG2532> Not <WG3756> Said <WG2036> To Him <WG846> <WG3588> Jesus, <WG2424> That <WG3754> <WG3756> He Does Not Die; <WG599> ' But, <WG235> If <WG1437> Him <WG846> I Desire <WG2309> To Abide <WG3306> Till <WG2193> I Come, <WG2064> What Is It <WG5101> To <WG4314> Thee? <WG4571>

This <WG3778> Is <WG2076> The <WG3588> Disciple <WG3101> Who <WG3588> Bears Witness <WG3140> Concerning <WG4012> These Things, <WG5130> And Who <WG2532> Wrote <WG1125> These Things : <WG5023> And <WG2532> We Know <WG1492> That <WG3754> True <WG227> Is <WG2076> <WG3588> <WG3141> His Witness. <WG846>

<WG2076> And There Are <WG1161> Also <WG2532> Other Things <WG243> Many <WG4183> Whatsoever <WG3745> Did <WG4160> <WG3588> Jesus, <WG2424> Which <WG3748> If <WG1437> They Should Be Written <WG1125> ' <WG2596> One By One, <WG1520> Not Even <WG3761> Itself <WG846> I Suppose <WG3633> The <WG3588> World <WG2889> Would Contain <WG5562> The <WG3588> Written <WG1125> Books. <WG975> Amen. <WG281>
